Package com.dua3.meja.model.poi

Class PoiSheet

java.lang.Object
com.dua3.meja.model.AbstractSheet<PoiSheet,PoiRow,PoiCell>
com.dua3.meja.model.poi.PoiSheet
All Implemented Interfaces:
Sheet, Iterable<Row>
public final class PoiSheet extends AbstractSheet<PoiSheet,PoiRow,PoiCell>
POI implementation of the Sheet interface.

  • Method Details

    • addMergedRegion

      public void addMergedRegion(RectangularRegion cells)
      Description copied from interface: Sheet
      Creates a new merged region in the sheet. A merged region is a rectangular area of cells that acts as a single cell. The content and style of the top-left cell in the region becomes the content and style for the entire merged region.
      Specified by:
      addMergedRegion in interface Sheet
      Overrides:
      addMergedRegion in class AbstractSheet<PoiSheet,PoiRow,PoiCell>
      Parameters:
      cells - the rectangular region of cells to be merged
      See Also:
      • Sheet.getMergedRegions()
      • Sheet.getMergedRegion(int, int)

    • getColumnCount

      public int getColumnCount()
      Description copied from interface: Sheet
      Returns the total number of columns in this sheet. This count includes all columns between 0 and the last used column, inclusive, regardless of whether individual columns contain data.
      Returns:
      the total number of columns in this sheet

    • getRowCount

      public int getRowCount()
      Description copied from interface: Sheet
      Returns the total number of rows in this sheet. This count includes all rows between 0 and the last used row, inclusive, regardless of whether individual rows contain data. Empty rows within this range are included in the count.
      Returns:
      the total number of rows in this sheet
      See Also:
      • Sheet.isEmpty()

    • getRowHeight

      public float getRowHeight(int rowIndex)
      Description copied from interface: Sheet
      Returns the height of the specified row in points. The height affects the visual presentation of the row in the sheet.
      Parameters:
      rowIndex - the row index (0-based)
      Returns:
      height of the specified row in points
      See Also:
      • Sheet.setRowHeight(int, float)
      • Sheet.getDefaultRowHeight()

    • getSheetName

      public String getSheetName()
      Description copied from interface: Sheet
      Returns the name of this sheet. The sheet name is a unique identifier within its workbook and is used to reference the sheet in formulas and programmatic access.
      Returns:
      the name of this sheet
      See Also:
      • Workbook

    • getSplitColumn

      public int getSplitColumn()
      Description copied from interface: Sheet
      Returns the frozen column split point. Columns before this point remain visible while scrolling horizontally. This is commonly used to keep headers visible.
      Returns:
      the number of the first unfrozen column (0-based)
      See Also:
      • Sheet.splitAt(int, int)

    • getSplitRow

      public int getSplitRow()
      Description copied from interface: Sheet
      Returns the frozen row split point. Rows before this point remain visible while scrolling vertically. This is commonly used to keep headers visible.
      Returns:
      the number of the first unfrozen row (0-based)
      See Also:
      • Sheet.splitAt(int, int)

    • setCurrentCell

      public boolean setCurrentCell(Cell cell)
      Description copied from interface: Sheet
      Sets the current (active) cell in the sheet. The current cell is used for navigation and editing operations. If the specified cell belongs to a merged region, the top-left cell of that region becomes the current cell.
      Parameters:
      cell - the cell to set as current. If null, the current cell selection is cleared.
      Returns:
      true if the current cell changed, false if the specified cell was already the current cell
      See Also:
      • Sheet.getCurrentCell()
      • Sheet.setCurrentCell(int, int)

    • setRowHeight

      Description copied from interface: Sheet
      Set row height.
      Parameters:
      rowIndex - the row index (0-based)
      height - the height of the row in points

    • setZoom

      public void setZoom(float zoom)
      Description copied from interface: Sheet
      Set the zoom factor for this sheet.
      Parameters:
      zoom - zoom factor, 1.0f=100%

    • splitAt

      public void splitAt(int rowIndex, int colIndex)
      Description copied from interface: Sheet
      Split (freeze) view.

      Splits the sheet so that rows above rowIndex and columns to the left of colIndex remain visible when scrolling.

      Parameters:
      rowIndex - row index (0-based)
      colIndex - column index (0-based)

    • getDefaultRowHeight

      public float getDefaultRowHeight()
      Description copied from interface: Sheet
      Get the default row height for this sheet, i.e., the height used when creating new rows.
      Returns:
      the default row height in typographical points (1/72 inch)

    • getDefaultColumnWidth

      Description copied from interface: Sheet
